PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-05592011-05-13PS,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Fees Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS FEES REGULATIONS, which extend the current fee waiver associated with renewing or upgrading an existing firearms licence until May 16, 2012. These amendments, along with the Firearms Licences Regulations and the Order Declaring an Amnesty Period (2006), would encourage previously lawful firearms owners to bring themselves back into compliance with federal firearms legislation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0111 Publication Date: 2011-05-25
